meanings.definition: Agamids: a family of lizards that includes the common iguana.
meanings.sent1: The agamids bask in the sun to warm themselves.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of agamids scurrying across the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The agamids decided to have a lizard race for fun.
meanings.sent4: The agamids in the garden were like tiny dinosaurs roaming around.
meanings.sent5: The colorful scales of the agamids shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Agamids: relating to or characteristic of the agamids.
meanings.sent1: The agamids habitat must be warm and dry.
meanings.sent2: Her pet lizard had agamids features, such as the spiky tail.
meanings.sent3: The agamids fashion show featured lizard-inspired outfits.
meanings.sent4: His agility on the basketball court was as swift as an agamids movements.
meanings.sent5: The agamids patterns on the wallpaper added a unique touch to the room.
